messages.message: @Aayush @Subash looks like there was an issue with opening up the model selector https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/10141/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1
we’ve seen lots of issues w/ Cypress and opening up dropdowns/hovercards if there’s an api call and a resulting re-render in between…
I wonder if there’s a way we can more broadly address this instead of doing it case by case :thinking_face:
I've added a cy.wait before this as a quick fix, let's see if that helps
